channel.title: Comments on: Monday Go Meditation: Game 44

item.title: By: flippertie

item.description: It seems to - I'll look in future games, Thanks
item.content:encoded: It seems to – I’ll look in future games, Thanks

item.title: By: Ben
item.dc:creator: Ben
item.description: Hey flippertie! So one of the ways you can access the variations is to click on the alternative move. It seems like in the build-in viewer, this is sometimes hidden if I marked it A. The easiest way though would probably be to download the SGF and open it in CGoban though if the built in viewer seems confusing. I'll try to make it more clear in future games though in case people only use the built-in viewer. Hope that helps!
item.content:encoded: Hey flippertie! So one of the ways you can access the variations is to click on the alternative move. It seems like in the build-in viewer, this is sometimes hidden if I marked it A. The easiest way though would probably be to download the SGF and open it in CGoban though if the built in viewer seems confusing. I’ll try to make it more clear in future games though in case people only use the built-in viewer. Hope that helps!

item.title: By: flippertie
item.dc:creator: flippertie
item.description: From time to time you mention 'see variation' in your comments. Is this possible using the built-in viewer or do I need to download the SGF and open it in another viewer?
item.content:encoded: From time to time you mention ‘see variation’ in your comments. Is this possible using the built-in viewer or do I need to download the SGF and open it in another viewer?

item.title: By: Ben
item.dc:creator: Ben
item.description: Move 16 - White S18 crossed my mind, but it seemed too passive and I didn't want to give Black the chance to seal me in afterwards. I think that would make his hane a good play when he was supposed to seal me in at the beginning. You're totally right about Move 40 S12. That would have really sucked. Haha. The hane was actually an overplay. Just bad moves one after another. Haha. =D Thanks for your feedback! See you around!
item.content:encoded:
Move 16 – White S18 crossed my mind, but it seemed too passive and I didn’t want to give Black the chance to seal me in afterwards. I think that would make his hane a good play when he was supposed to seal me in at the beginning.
You’re totally right about Move 40 S12. That would have really sucked. Haha. The hane was actually an overplay. Just bad moves one after another. Haha. =D
Thanks for your feedback! See you around!

item.content:encoded:
Hi Bengo, thank you for the very nice review.
Move 16: Why not â€”â€” White S18 ? Black can tenuki now, but after white Q18, black P18, white R19 â€¦ black has to protect P17 because the ladder is good for white. You would have regain sente and could just invade without â€žrunningâ€œ with the group? Don`t know if that makes sense, but that was my thought ðŸ™‚
I think you are right about move 36, looks slowâ€¦
After move 40 what about next for black to play at S12?
Ok now thanks again for the fine review! Cu

item.title: By: Ben
item.dc:creator: Ben
item.description: So if you choose G14, Black can either start a ko or simply play L14 and capture the entire N14 group. Haha. xD
item.content:encoded: So if you choose G14, Black can either start a ko or simply play L14 and capture the entire N14 group. Haha. xD

item.title: By: Ben
item.dc:creator: Ben
item.description: Haha. It's all good. I'll have to be much more attentive next time I play him. I was multi-tasking at the time, so my slack moves just appear over and over. Haha. That won't ever happen again! =D
item.content:encoded: Haha. It’s all good. I’ll have to be much more attentive next time I play him. I was multi-tasking at the time, so my slack moves just appear over and over. Haha. That won’t ever happen again! =D
